channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Clothing

item.title: Hamro Boutique
item.description: Hamro boutique: - Clothes that is versatile enough for a day with girls, women , all women wear. Ultimate destination for Ethnic wear, best known for Bridal wear.
item.dc:creator: prakash

item.title: Store One
item.description: We are leading retailer of cotton kurtis fetching hot fresh Kurtis from every nook and corner of India. But theres more...we deal in major intimate wear brands that you would definitely want to fancy. Come visit us for more surprises.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: 100patri
item.description:
100patri.com is the Nepal's cheapest online ladies clothing store. Worldwide delivery available within 5-7 days.
Available: Sarees, Lehenga, Kurta Salwar, tops, Western Dresses, Sweater, Jackets etc
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: EXTRA COLLECTION FASHION WEAR
item.description: EXTRA CHOICE FASHIONWEAR is a casual wear manufacturer and retailer aiming to become the leading clothing chain store in Nepal. It makes sure that its products are reasonably priced and provides ‘the tools for fashion, so that everybody can express their own style’. It is a manufacturer & retailer of apparel for Men Women & Kids with quality & comfort at the most reasonable prices. It is continuously developing products of exceptional quality and grace to deliver an extensive line of fashion apparel. Treat yourself with distinctive styles from this popular collection including outerwear like Jackets, Trousers and Hoodies for winter and T-shirts, Polos and Shorts for the summer, and more!
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Calcutta Clothing Store
item.description: We are one of the Oldest retail stores in Jogbani, stocking nothing but fresh fashion! We deal in Designer Saree, Lehengas, Bedsheets, Kurta Salwar, Shirting Suitings and many more. All you need to do is step in and discover something for yourself. With superb Quality Products and flexible exchange policy, we assure you the best Shopping experience. Serving you from past 48 years!
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Kamana Impex
item.description: We are renowned at Biratnagar for School as well as college uniform provider. We also sell Suiting and shirting clothes, kurtis, pajamas, Bed sheets, Quilt, etc. Our latest one is daura and suruwal for speical occasions such as marriage, functions, party, etc. We make cumstomized daura and suruwal for our clients needs and on time. For more information please call us at: 021-532301
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Euro Corner 99 Shop
item.description:
We deal with gift items such as dolls, flower, kitchen ware, show piece, door mat, rice cooker, emergency lights, perfume, creams, chess. ludo, children toys etc.
We are situated at Rangeli Road opposite of Prabhu Bank Biratnagar.
